Entries.{{ModId}}_E5/e {{ModId}}_E4/t 1000 1400/: continue/7 21/farmer 10 10 3 Penny 17 12 0 Jas 17 9 2 Vincent 19 10 3/addConversationTopic PilotPenny4 5/skippable/fade/pause 300/speak Penny "Today, we're going to learn about something very interesting.#$b#In front of me, I have a glass of water, a rock, and a marshmallow.#$b#The rock and the marshmallow are about the same size.#$b#If I put them into the glass of water, what do you think will happen?"/pause 200/emote Jas 40/pause 100/speak Vincent "The rock will sink because it's heavy!"/pause 200/speak Penny "Very good Vincent!"/pause 200/speak Vincent "Unless you throw it like my brother!#$b#Then it skips first!$1"/pause 200/speak Penny "That's true! But we don't have enough space in this glass to skip the rock, so it will sink.$1#$b#What about the marshmallow?"/pause 200/speak Jas "I think it will float!"/pause 200/speak Penny "That's right Jas! Why do you think that?"/pause 200/speak Jas "Because it's light! And it looks like one of my floaties!"/pause 200/emote Penny 32/pause 200/speak Penny "Alright, now let's test it."/pause 200/playSound dropItemInWater/pause 200/playSound dropItemInWater/pause 200/speak Penny "Looks like both of you were right!$1#$b#The rock sank and the marshmallow floated."/pause 200/emote Vincent 20/emote Jas 20/pause 200/speak Penny "But why did they do that?#$b#Why is the marshmallow lighter than the rock, even though they're both the same size?"/pause 200/emote Jas 8/emote Vincent 8/speak Penny "It's because of something very important. Watch!"/pause 200/playSound dropItemInWater/pause 200/emote Jas 16/emote Vincent 16/pause 200/speak Jas "It sank!"/pause 200/emote Penny 32/pause 200/speak Penny "Water has density too, and it's pretty heavy.#$b#When something is more dense than water, it sinks.
